kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://thomas-bayer.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://thomas-bayer.com/sqlrest/CUSTOMER/15 path_url=/sqlrest/CUSTOMER/15 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://thomas-bayer.com/sqlrest/CUSTOMER/15 status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'Apache-Coyote/1.1', 'Content-Type': 'application/xml', 'Date': 'Wed, 17 Aug 2022 06:03:41 GMT', 'Content-Length': '227'} body=<?xml version="1.0"?><CUSTOMER xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"> <ID>15</ID> <FIRSTNAME>Bill</FIRSTNAME> <LASTNAME>Clancy</LASTNAME> <STREET>319 Upland Pl.</STREET> <CITY>Seattle</CITY> </CUSTOMER>

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the text of the specified element is ``expected``.

kw.name: Get Child Elements
kw.doc: Returns the child elements of the specified element as a list.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Get Element Text
kw.doc: Returns all text of the element, possibly whitespace normalized.
